rows.label: tlk70000018_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey! You're a bunch of Drivers and
Blades, aren't you?

rows.label: tlk70000018_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Have you ever come across places you
thought you could reach but couldn't,
or paths you couldn't go down?

rows.label: tlk70000018_01_msg0003
rows.name:
At times like those, I'd recommend you
make use of the Blades' powers.

rows.label: tlk70000018_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Drivers are strong, but they have their
limits. Working together with Blades
can open up lots of new possibilities.

rows.label: tlk70000018_01_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm not a Driver, of course! But if there
was a Blade with fishing powers, you
better believe I'd want its help. Heh.
